Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Though teachers is aware of the assignment details and with the help of the marking rubrics could explain why a student got a certain grade on what went wrong in general; the use of GenAi might be more useful as it may give more detailed analysis of why I went wrong and where I could improve on.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAi might be able to give more detailed and critical analysis as to why a student got a certain grade and what needs to be done to score higher next time alongside what held them back initially.
